title: Deck of punishment
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| Type | Miscellaneous item                                                                             |
| :--- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Name | deck of punishment                                                                             |
| Icon | [![Deck of punishment.png](/images/8/82/Deck_of_punishment.png)](/File:Deck_of_punishment.png) |

|   |                                                        |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A deck of magical cards which wreak havoc on the user. |

The **deck of punishment** is a [deck](/Deck "Deck") whose cards are used by [Nemelex Xobeh](/Nemelex_Xobeh "Nemelex Xobeh") to punish offenders.

The possible cards across versions in this deck are shown in the table below.

html:
Deck of punishment

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Type Miscellaneous item
Name deck of punishment
Icon
A deck of magical cards which wreak havoc on the user.

The deck of punishment is a deck whose cards are used by Nemelex Xobeh to punish offenders.

The possible cards across versions in this deck are shown in the table below.
